function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Fragmented data sources and solutions for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited amount of data for forecasting new covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weekly forecasts of total deaths and hospitalization for the usa","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital contact tracing systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid implementation of virtual clinics in response to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration of data sources of existing digital transformation technologies","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of digital transformation technologies without holistic management","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of governmental data including health records poses a risk of privacy breaches and data misuse.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of personal private data sources raises the risk of data exposure and unauthorized use.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of unauthorized access to private health records due to the use of digital technologies.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of non-compliance with government regulations for transferring and sharing private health data over the internet.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of data manipulation and tampering within the blockchain-based infrastructure.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for misdiagnosis due to inaccuracies in ai and machine learning models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of data privacy and security breaches from the use of iot devices and mobile applications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for over-reliance on telemedicine and remote monitoring, leading to missed or delayed physical examinations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly developing drugs and vaccines for covid-19 by utilization of robots and cps technologies","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Helping hospitalized patients in transporting and serving food or medicines by robots","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Developing unique treatment protocol for each patient and identifying patients with a higher possibility of developing severe symptoms based on their initial symptoms as a result of the utilization of ai and big data technology for analyzing patients’ historical health records and response to current treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Offering extensive healthcare services as monitoring patients’ health in a real-time manner and tracking their medicine use periodically by the integration of smart medical devices with iomt technology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai-powered applications for risk forecasting, simulation, and modeling of covid-19 spread may have inaccuracies leading to misinformed decisions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing iot, mobile, and surveillance camera data for tracing and warning about social distancing and wearing masks may infringe upon privacy rights and lead to surveillance concerns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of drones, robotics, and image processing technologies for identifying high-risk zones may lead to public anxiety and distrust.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation, myths, and conspiracy theories about covid-19 spread through ai on social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data security and privacy measures for the collected health data","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to public health measures due to surveillance and tracking methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of inaccurate or unreliable data from multiple sources leading to incorrect decision-making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misuse of autonomous robots for disinfection leading to improper disinfection or safety hazards","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks associated with the use of user data for diagnosis and tracking","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation, myths, and conspiracy theories about covid-19 leading to increased stress levels in people.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous data sources and the time necessary to develop ai-powered applications.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to managing databases containing private health records, even in encrypted form.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of historical data impacting the performance of data analysis models.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmentation of digital transformation technologies leading to coordination challenges.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of expertise in it, domain experts, and data scientists for real-time big data processing platforms.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scalability challenges with blockchain-based platform for managing digital transformation technologies.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of legislation for governance rights, ownership, and distributed storage structure of blockchain.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented digital technologies may not effectively address contemporary problems created by the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to build a critical mass of engaged users for digital contact tracing apps.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adoption and trust in the proposed digital transformation framework architecture.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of data sources and digital technologies may lead to privacy breaches and unauthorized access to sensitive healthcare information.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Holistic digital transformation framework may face challenges in adoption and implementation, leading to inefficiencies and gaps in the healthcare system.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital solutions may result in cybersecurity vulnerabilities and cyber-attacks, posing a threat to the integrity and availability of critical healthcare systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential future pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interaction between urban environment and pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of architectural and urban design on the experience of gated community residents during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Factors influencing resident preferences for gated communities during pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift from physical to virtual environments for safe interactions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gated communities as a potential factor in disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate around the adequacy of gated communities in relation to the spread of pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
